# init()

**Initializer**

Creates a new physics joints component.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Discussion

The initializer sets the component’s [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PhysicsJointsComponent/joints] property to an empty set.
title: init()
